fr.n7.saceca.u3du.model.ai.service
Class Service

java.lang.Object
  fr.n7.saceca.u3du.model.ai.service.Service
All Implemented Interfaces:
Storable
public class Service
extends java.lang.Object
implements Storable

A class to represent a service. A service is shared among all its providers.

Author:
Sylvain Cambon

Constructor Detail

Service

public Service(java.lang.String name,
               boolean active,
               int maxDistanceForUsage,
               java.util.Set<Category> providerCategories,
               java.util.Set<Category> consumerCategories,
               StatementsGroup statements,
               java.lang.Class<? extends Action> actionClass)
Instantiates a new service.

Parameters:
name - The name.
active - Whether the service is active
maxDistanceForUsage - the maximum distance for usage
providerCategories - the provider categories
consumerCategories - All the consumerCategories the consumer has to be part of at the same time to use this service.
statements - The statements, i.e. the conditions and results of this sevice.
actionClass - the action class
